text: Hi Roshaan! :slightly_smiling_face: I hear you have an interest in potentially studying biology? What areas of biology interest you've
Hi Caitlin, I'm sorry for not initiating a talk yesterday because I had lots of school work to do and did not check the Slack app.

For biology, currently, I'm not aware of any career options. I have tried researching it but the only things that caught my interest were Research and Teaching. I'm not sure if other career options are either not good or the particular website that i checked didn't mention it, but It would be really helpful if you could outline the main career pathways for Biology

Also it would be great if we could settle upon a certain time for us to talk about this. From morning to about 7pm, I'm mostly involved with doing school work and therefore unable to respond to you. It would be convenient for both of us to talk for a certain time period without any disruptions or waiting for replies back.
